title: One Piece: Adventure of Nebulandia
alternative_title: ワンピース～アドベンチャー オブ ネブランディア～
description: This special will have the Straw Hats fight Foxy again in the New World on Nebulandia, an island that nullifies Devil Fruit powers.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
